DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate woman locally unresectable metastatic breast cancer treat docetaxel , leucovorin calcium , fluorouracil second third-line chemotherapy . - Evaluate toxic effect regimen patient . - Determine time progression patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 leucovorin calcium IV 1 hour follow fluorouracil IV 5 minute day 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 4 week 2-8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 21-45 patient accrue study within 44 month .
